scenes.action_text: THE BATTLE OF SHAKER HEIGHTS Written by Erica Beeney FADE IN: EXT. FOREST - DAY DISTANT GUN AND MORTAR FIRE Muffled by the wet green forest. The very earth seems to tremble. A RABBIT Darts out of a log, lifts itself on its hind legs and sniffs the air. LOBBED GRENADE EXPLODES VOICES and SHOUTS, closer now, mix with the rumbling WAR SOU
